metadata.title: CVE-2013-6887 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: OpenJPEG 1.5.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service viaunspecified vectors that trigger NULL pointer dereferences,division-by-zero, and other errors.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
